resources.string: For Help and Support You can call us on below numbers.

Notice the embedded tabs and extra spaces mixed into the middle of the output. It looks pretty rough. We can do better if we start by removing any common whitespace prefix from all of the lines in the sample text. This allows us to use docstrings or embedded multi-line strings straight from our Python code while removing the formatting of the code itself. The sample string has an artificial indent level introduced for illustrating this feature. Notice the embedded tabs and extra spaces mixed into the middle of the output. It looks pretty rough.
